Index.name: Viet Anh
Index.perex: I'm an experienced front-end developer who cares about writing clean, maintainable code using the latest tools and best practices. I'm passionate, communicative, and always eager to learn more about tech and beyond. Honesty, empathy, patience, and a strong sense of responsibility are at the core of how I work.
